name: Crazy Zen Mini Golf
description: Crazy Zen Mini Golf Marvellous Mystical Mini-Golf Madness! Experience the most mesmerising Mini-Golf game in the world! Explore the magical mini-golf madness as you adventure through our zany zen garden. Channel your inner zen in serene scenes and putt to perfection to complete all the holes in as few strokes as possible! Whether you’re playing individually or competing against friends, there’s endless fun to be had battling to beat the top score! Delve into this mind-blowing Mini-Golf world and marvel at the sensational gameplay to be had. Breathtakingly beautiful backdrops set the stage for exhilarating adventures amidst a realm of golfing glory! Collect coins to boost your chances of beating your opponent! Master the bouncing ball and jump to triumph! Select your swing strength, aim and shoot, taking the fastest route to the hole! Whizz your way around the colourful courses, wall-riding and mastering moving platforms whilst you swerve swinging pendulums and dive through Dragon’s mouths! As your skills skyrocket you’ll fly past the frothing fountains and prickly pyramids, bouncing off the bumpers and boost pads as you go! Grab this Mini-Golf mastery now to become the next putting Pro! Features include: Crazy courses Stunning scenery Awesome obstacles Varied 9 hole courses Multiplayer option Teleportation holes Jumping Ball Rainbow Ball

name: Crow Crime: A Murder Mystery
description: When a pudding goes missing, C.C. Crowe is on the case.

name: Goblet Cave
description: Goblet Cave is a first person cave exploration adventure game where you explore a treacherous, procedurally generated cavern. Use ropes, bombs and platforms to navigate deep into the cave in search of the Goblet.

name: Highscore Hunter Hodgepodge
description: Highscore Hunter Hodgepodge is a 4-in-1 game collection with online leaderboards.

name: Princess Maker: Faery Tales Come True
description: A lovable and sensible simulation game to raise a girl who has visited you to make her dreams come true. An upgraded version of the classic simulation game has come back with many updates!

name: Eagletalon vs. Horde of the Flies
description: The Eagle Talon is Super hard! Freakin' hard! And now in Puzzle Action form! You become the fighting leader of Eagle Talon, collecting artifacts and friends, and prevent Horde of the Flies' aspirations of world dominance! This game will require you to use your head!

name: IOX
description: Top-down scifi ARPG set in the future around the orbits of Jupiter. You take the role of a mercenary that works contract missions to various corporations operating in the solar system.

name: Streets of Neotokio
description: Neotokio is the capital city of Japan in the year 3020. A place whose control is fought over between two Yakuza clans: the conservative clan Minashigo and the progressive clan Kuroi Taiyo. Put yourself into the position of Kaito, who has to rescue Aiko and recover his lost honour as samurái of the clan Minashigo.

name: Drone Racer
description: Want to enjoy FPV drone racing at home? Fly through the wide maps. Switch FPV and TPV view at any time and support both PC and VR play.

name: Pulstario
description: A small, challenging space game about collecting missing souls in the void.

name: Eternal Battlefield
description: Eternal Battlefield is a free multiplayer royale-style arena game. 4 teams of 2 go head-to-head in an exciting, spell filled arena death match where the last team standing wins. Defeat neutral creeps and enemy players to grow your forces!

name: The Land of Crows
description: "The Land of Crows" is a side-scroller gothic story adventure game, inspired by the literary works of the Masters of romantic and horror literature (E.A. Poe, J.W. Goethe, A. Mickiewicz, J. Slowacki) and lovecraftian mythos.

name: Cthulhu Saves Christmas
description: Eldritch horror saves Christmas for fun & profit in this fast-paced turn-based JRPG comedy.

name: Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3: The Black Order - Rise of the Phoenix
description:
The second DLC in the Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3: The Black Order Expansion Pass.

Four more X-Men join the alliance—Phoenix, Gambit, Ice Man, and Cable— as part of the second of 3 DLC packs included with the Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3: The Black Order Expansion Pass. This pack includes these four playable characters, the newly added Danger Room Mode, and additional Gauntlet missions.

name: Primitive Survival
description: Collect resources, build a base, defend yourself against monsters, do everything to survive!

name: Princess Maker: Go! Go! Princess
description:
The elements of the Princess Maker series remain intact! The ability status is up through various events, training, and part-time jobs in the field! Rival, study, part-time job and love.... The tumultuous eight years will begin on the board!

Only the dice knows the destiny!
Uzu and Cube The navigator to help your daughter. Throw a dice and go on an adventure with the friend who will decide your daughter's fate!

name: Desire & Decorum: First Winter
description: Desire & Decorum: First Winter is a holiday special book of the Desire & Decorum series.

name: Illuminate
description: Illuminate is an immersive 2D platformer where one plays as a lightbulb who must endure a journey through the streets of the Mission District. Throughout the game the lightbulb is following his family's trail, who have disappeared from Mission District due to displacement.

name: 2 American
description: 2 American is a dialogue centered side scroller where you play as Ashley Trinh, a first-gen Asian American, who has trouble communicating to her immigrant parents due to a language and cultural barrier. In this game, we highlight the frustration of having decisions made for you and not knowing how to talk to your parents about it. 2 American serves as a window into some of the hardships a child of immigrants born in America might have to deal with in their immigrant household such as not understanding what your parents are saying when they speak to you, being compared to your more successful cousin, and arguing about what career you must have in the future.

name: Oak Beats
description: Sin descripción

name: Te Amo Mamá
description: Te Amo Mamá is a 2D side scroller that exposes players to the (often underrepresented) experience of motherhood. Become a mother hen who guides and protects her chick as they make their way back to their flock.

name: Uprooted
description:
Uprooted is a 2D platformer that explores themes of assimilation and heritage loss common to immigrant narratives by forcing the player to sacrifice abilities in order to progress through the world.

As part of a fully POC team completely new to game development, we drew heavily from our own experiences and those of our parents to craft this game. Just as the player finds it exponentially more difficult to accomplish previously simple tasks with the loss of each ability, some of our parents, for instance, struggled with language barriers that made even setting up simple doctors appointments (or self-advocacy at them) daunting. In just ten short weeks, we set out to replicate their experience.

Join Dru as she faces the same trials, leaving everything she knows behind and sacrificing both her native tongue and abilities in order to pursue a new life elsewhere.

name: Idle Magic School
description: Ever wanted to build and manage a magic academy? Expand your school and upgrade classes. Enroll new students and watch them graduate. Expand, automate and boost school construction with magic coins! Keep an eye out for the ingredients that can brew potions and aid your journey. As you step outside and explore the magic world, the map will reveal details of school, such as dormitories, magic alley and classrooms.

name: A Tale at the Bonfire
description: You're missing in the forest and you have to leave... but it won't that easy. You'll have to survive during the dark night next to a bonfire you find... Will you get it?

name: Math Labyrinth
description: A small Bitsy game the developer made to help teach their son math.

name: Slay Bells
description: Slay Bells is a Christmas-themed survival horror game inspired by 80's slasher movies and PS1 horror games.

name: Ravon
description: Ravon is a new rhythm game established in 2019 that combines elements of reading, memory, and pattern recognition. With 4 difficulty levels, this game has charts for rhythm gamers of all skill levels. There is either a 3x5 or 4x6 grid of squares, and notes come down in 4 directions that a player has to tap when it reaches the center of a particular square that is indicated with a white outline.

name: Don't Take it Personally, I Just Don't Like You: The Camping Trip
description: Don't Take it Personally, I Just Don't Like You is a lo-fi relationship dramedy about camping illegally on government property in the chill of early autumn, having public anxiety attacks in crowded shopping malls, the people we choose to be with, and what we do when they don't choose us back. In this demo, you'll be introduced to several characters and locations from the full game (including two romanceable characters!) in a fully self-contained, hour-long story.

name: Auto Afterlife
description: Auto Afterlife is an an Existential Horror Car Dating Sim.

name: K37-D
description:
K37-D is a game for science fiction fans about an ordinary space engineer in the year 2204 who takes a seemingly simple job that quickly becomes more complex. This single-player adventure game takes place in a facility on the distant planet of Kepler 37-D, where you have been sent to repair utility systems and get the facility ready for its new owners. You’ll have to use the various computer systems throughout the facility to gather information and aid you in your job. 
 
The job gets dangerous when the facility is unexpectedly attacked by some hideous unknown creatures. Now the pressure is on as you try to repair the communications unit so you can call for the transport ship. Fortunately, the facility is equipped with auto-defense turrets, which you’ll have to manage wisely to keep the creatures from breaching the facility. You can also use the tank rover to easily dispatch of the creatures before they can get a chance to get through the walls. 
 
If you're confident in your defenses you may even find a little time to go snooping around the facility while you're making your repairs and discover something interesting or useful. Depending on what you do during your assignment on Kepler 37-D, there are 9 possible endings that you can earn. Will you be happy with how it ends for you or will you try again for a better outcome?

name: Santa Challenge
description:
Welcome to the magical period of Christmas where Santa will brings you on an adventure to verify if everything is ready in the human world for the festivities that will arrive the 24th! 
 
Join Santa on his tour to check that Christmas is well prepared! Complete 30 HD jigsaw puzzles about Winter/ Christmas and Festivities.

name: Swords and Sandals Spartacus
description: The latest addition to the Swords and Sandals family is an all new combat platformer based on the life of the legendary gladiator Spartacus. Take up the sword of the great man and do battle with the might of the Roman Republic.

name: Under a Caustic Snow, I Danced
description: To a town by a crater lake, a traveller comes.

name: Clumsy Rush
description:
Clumsy Rush is a fun-filled game that will have you and your friends laughing for hours. Move around like a duck, bump each other, steal the crown and have ton of fun together because time spent with friends and family is priceless.

Just tap out a beat and move your feet! Left foot, right foot, left foot, right foot – find your rhythm. It is absorbing, funny and cheerful.

name: Creature Card Idle
description: Idler meets TCG! An incremental game where you place cards strategically on a grid to generate resources, and you spend those resources to purchase booster packs containing new cards.

name: Whimsy
description: Whimsy is the story of a girl awaking in the forest, as she always does, and stumbling upon little red footprints. Following these footsteps leads her on a whimsical journey through the forest to solve puzzles, assist woodland creatures and discover rituals.

name: Genso Flood Front
description: A doujin game by FriendSea based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Picomin
description: Totally original RTS about bossing around plant people

name: Displacer Beast
description:
There's something wrong with your new cat.

A ghost story about small creatures and the harm we do to each other.

Warning: This game contains written descriptions of gore, animal death, emotional abuse, and fleshy abominations.

name: 100% Orange Juice: Old Guardian Pack
description: The Old Guardian Pack adds 2 new playable characters from developer Orange Juice's games - far future version of series protagonist Suguri, Suguri (46 Billion Years) and the mischievous ship AI, Sumika. The new characters come fully voiced and have their own campaign!

name: Troll Patrol
description:
"Troll Patrol" is a puzzle game which combines the tile-matching and RPG genres by offering a unique experience: Play as the last defender of the threatened troll den where vicious village people and heroes from far away castles and kingdoms knock down your door. 
 
Stand firm, take whatever weapon is close and fight them off to get your family and friends to safety. Protect what is rightfully yours, your home, your heritage. They come for blood, for revenge, to still their blood thirst. But you won't allow it. 
 
 
Fight of waves of enemies, each consisting of at least 50 turns. Each turn you can collect connected tiles which will yield rewards depending on their type: 
 
 -  Potions heal you and might even yield you a powerful healing potion that you might use whenever you need it. 
 -  Shields will replenish your armor and count towards your loot value. Collect enough and you can improve your items. You might even find explosives. 
 -  Coins will allow you to purchase stronger weapons and more powerful armor. 
 -  Swords can be connected with enemies to deal them damage. Killing them will increase your experience which will lead to levelups and new and better skills. 
 
 
At the end of each wave you will encounter a boss enemy who is stronger and more dangerous than any other enemy you encountered on your way so far. Defeating him can unlock new features and new enemy types. Completing a wave may even trigger a random event that will offer you multiple choices to resolve it. 
 
After your first patrol you may also select one of multiple offered quests which will yield you tentacles and other rewards which can be used to purchase permanent upgrades for your cave. 
 
Will you be the saviour of your people? Or just another worm, crushed under the heels of those so-called heroes?

name: Equaboreal 12.21
description: Equaboreal 12.21 is a small and strange speculative narrative game about plant people who celebrate the winter solstice by opening bottled light delivered from the equator.

name: Spass Taxi
description: Spass Taxi is a clone of the original Space Taxi, where you need to bring passengers from one pad to another in weird environments with unexpected obstacles.

name: Raccoon: The Orc Invasion
description: Racoon lives in a forest with his friends. He had a happy and a joyful life, until in the mountains appeared a portal.From the portal came out some strange creatures he never saw before. They are orcs. Your mission is to protect the forest and your friends from invaders.

name: World of Guns: VR
description: World of Guns: VR lets you delve into the inner workings of guns from the largest gears to the smallest screws now in VR

name: ESP Ra.De. Psi
description: A Collaboration between M2 and original creator Junya Inoue to revive the 1998-released arcade shoot ’em up. The complete port adds improvements such as new mode, new visuals, and new voice-overs.

name: Red Eclipse
description: Red Eclipse is a fun-filled new take on the first person arena shooter, featuring parkour, impulse boosts, and more. The development is geared toward balanced gameplay, with a general theme of agility in a variety of environments.

name: Yoru no Kasou
description: Sin descripción

name: Off Base
description: Around medium-sized idbase map.

name: TerraTech: Weapons of War Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: TerraTech: To the Stars Pack
description: Relive Roswell with Better Future and enter the Space Race as GSO, with this set of unique custom blocks and themed skins.

name: Okui
description: Ōkui: Beat em up and Eat em up is a 2D action-platformer game where you play as a ninja frog, and your sole mission is to defeat the forces of evil with the power of good and everything righteous, and well… your appetite…

name: My Animal Girlfriend
description:
Your first job out of college is going well, but you just don't seem to be having much luck finding love in your life. But one day, you save a mysterious fortune teller from a group of delinquents. He tells your fortune to show his gratitude and he says that you'll soon meet three mysterious and beautiful girls...

Soon after, you actually do meet these girls and hit it off well immediately! They invite you over to their house, but there you discover the "mysterious" part that the fortune teller was talking about. They're secretly part animal!

name: Epic + Inferno: The Odyssey Continues Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: How a Healthy Hentai Administers Public Service
description: How a Healthy Hentai Administers Public Service is an erotic comedy developed by CLOCKUP, where we follow the daily life of Jin Sintani, the precinct's newest sex officer charged with serving the community and protecting the peaceful citizens of Vaginville from the threat of sexual frustration.

name: Your Time to Shine: Island Existence
description:
Light-hearted spinoff of Your Turn to Die: Death Game by Majority.

Twelve people wake up on a deserted island with no idea of how they got there. They get told by the Island Master, Sue Miley, that they're on the Isle of Memories and they must survive there for 30 days before they can be released. With no other choice, the twelve agree to cooperate with each other, build shelter, forage, and fight monsters while getting to know one another.

name: Jibaku Kanojo: Kanojo wa Kakurete Mimodaeru
description: Sin descripción

name: Aery: Little Bird Adventure
description: Aery is a peaceful exploration game from the perspective of a little bird who decided to discover the world. Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying, and immerse yourself into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: One Piece: World Seeker - Extra Episode 3: The Unfinished Map
description: Play as Law as he takes the stage as a new playable character in this extra episode. Explore a new area, Skypiea, and unshroud the mystery of the island with the young Roule.

name: Suzukuri Dungeon: Karin in the Mountain
description:
Expand your budding labyrinth, and strengthen your squads of fearsome (and cute) demons!
Build amenities to shake intruders down for cash, then send them packing with well-placed traps and bosses!
Cozy up to your sexy and stalwart companions, and maybe a few dungeon-delving adventurers...!

name: Drunki!
description: Drunki! is a online party game, open the drunkii.com website on a browser and join the game with your phone. Up to 12 players per game, and more than 300 question and challenges.

name: JDM Racing
description: Drive legendary Japanese cars on various tracks. Beat records, take part in different racing events, rise from Beginner to Pro League driver. Collect, win, tune up, and upgrade your dream cars.

name: The Shell Part I: Inferno
description:
The secrets of a case from six years prior may just be the key to the current unending cycle of tragedy, and the thing that cracks this woeful world’s shell may be one girl’s smile.

The Shell Part I: Inferno is a visual novel set in the Showa era, depicting the story of a detective who receives a request from a young girl and uncovers the secret hidden within her.

name: SaDistic BlooD
description:
The Vampires Yuna and Shizuha come to the island city of Chisakura hoping to find refuge from the relentless pursuit of Vampire Hunters. However, it turns out that the Hunters are already lying in wait for them. Will the Vampire duo escape the Hunters' trap and live to see tomorrow, or will they meet a fate worse than death...?

The two Vampires travel Japan together, evading the pursuit of Vampire Hunters in an attempt to live out their undead eternity in freedom. On the fateful night of their arrival in Chisakura, the full moon shines down upon the duo, intensifying their Vampiric impulses. The two attempt to slake their thirst for blood while remaining unnoticed.

Little do they know that lying in wait for them in the island city is a Hunters' trap. Outnumbered by a party of dangerous biological weapons commanded by the vengeful Yuika, the two Vampires must now weigh their options. Do they go on the run and flee Chisakura, or do they stand their ground and fight?

With the odds stacked against them and time running out, Yuna and Shizuha must choose wisely if both of them are to escape with their lives. Will the Vampire duo escape the Hunters' trap and live to see tomorrow, or will they meet a fate worse than death...?

name: Endless Scroll
description: A game about high school memories, growth, and being online late at night.

name: 单身狗的最后机会
description: 我们尝试用这款轻松休闲的模拟扮演游戏，模拟从相识到相恋的这一个短暂过程，希望大家喜欢。

name: Future Pool
description: Future Pool is a futuristic version of 8-ball pool. Players take turns to shoot a cue-ball on a circular pool table. The first player to knock out all of their balls, plus the black 8-ball, wins. A game for one or two players with a selection of computer opponents.

name: Cafe Stella to Shinigami no Chou
description: Cafe Stella to Shinigami no Chou is a slice of life visual novel mixed with plot and incredible art. A story of a Cafe, Grim Reapers, pancakes, coffee, and love!

name: Moves
description: Moves is a minimalist puzzle game where you must use your mathematical skills to solve tricky puzzles.

name: Remember
description: Someone somehow gets in touch with you. And you don't know what they are.

name: North of Iraq Part 1
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Builder's Journey
description:
A story about play, connections and adventure.

Step through levels brick by brick with puzzles that ask us to sometimes follow the instructions… and sometimes to be creative and break the rules.

Builder’s Journey is a poetic puzzle that takes place in a LEGO brick world, brought to life with the most accurately rendered LEGO elements yet to feature on screens. Be taken through a breathtaking world filled with brick-by-brick effects, accompanied by a beautiful soundtrack.

Throughout the narrative, there will be ups and downs, challenges and celebrations. Take the time to experiment, and most importantly, to play as figuring out who we are and what we become is the Builder’s Journey.

name: RocketPods
description:
Thrust your way through the galaxy's hardest obstacle courses! Learn how to control a RocketPod while also controlling your own frustration and fury.

Start out as a novice, and leave as a Legend. Unlock the rarest RocketPods, earn EXP, and attain new Rankings. Compare your pilot profile and mission results with your friends for competitive play!

The galaxy of RocketPods is vast and replete with trillions of planets! Visit exotic gas giants that feature beautifully pre-rendered 3D artwork and animations!

name: Wabisabi
description: Wabisabi follows Kousuke, an artist who is struggling to understand himself and what role he plays in the universe. Joining him are the game’s two heroines Haru and Aki, spirits who tend to the shrine in Kousuke’s rural village. After spending a semester away in Tokyo for school, Kousuke returns to his village to spend time with the shrine spirits and possibly discover what his art lacks. Throughout the story, Kousuke deals with the unnerving realization that he will never be his Grandfather, who was a genius artist that gave everything away to move to the village.

name: Frontline: The Great Patriotic War
description: A tactical scale strategy game that invites the players to take command of the URSS forces in an epic struggle for the control of Russia during World War Two.

name: Stationflow
description: Stationflow is a game about controlling the flow of thousands of passengers by building and managing an efficient underground train station.

name: PyroNinja: Fire Dodge
description: Dodge fireballs for as long as possible and collect coins.

name: The Shenanigans of Cherry and Trix
description: The Shenanigans of Cherry and Trix follows the story of one amnesiac little ghost and her new loner troll friend. With the hit of a button, swap control between the two heroines on their journey to discover what it means to truly live.

name: Bionic Hunter VR
description: Hunt down Monsters in a Sci-Fi Horror Survival Shooter and test your Skills among other players! Live an immersive experience with latest generation graphics.

name: New Year's Eve 2020
description: Counting down on New Year's Eve, brings you relaxed experience in confusion

name: Fight Angel: Special Edition
description: Fight Angel is the girl fighting game with great customization functions with physical effects that make realistic boobs movements and clothing destruction systems. Let's fight the challenger with your partner! This is a special edition of Fight Angel.

name: Reincarnated As A Monster
description: Reincarnated As A Monster is an RPG game that you became a monster and try to survive in a fantasy world. Uncover the truth about the world, and make your choice to help or destroy others. Of course, it will affect the story's ending. The battle is not just lost or win, but you can also escape from battle!

name: Baldr Sky
description: Kou Kadokura, a cyber officer, seeks to uncover the truth behind the tragedy that ended his once peaceful life. A war looms, and the answers he’s looking for are locked away in him... So why can't he remember anything? Unravel the mysteries hidden in his lost memories through this fast-paced mech action game!

name: nStations
description: If you think this is just another simulation game about a post-apocalyptic event where people now need to colonize outer worlds... You're SOOOO wrong. This game is the first of this genre where you can start playing in any supported platform and keep playing on others and come back anytime you want. HD graphics and outstanding sound effects and simulation features playable anywhere.

name: The Paperman
description: The Paperman is a Virtual Reality game for all the horror lovers. In the game you'll have to explore all the levels facing the challenges you encounter.

name: Trial and Terror
description: Surreal, abstract and dark puzzle featuring simple yet challenging mechanics. The retro maze awaits!

name: Inferna
description: Inferna is a player-friendly, free-to-play open-world MMORPG with unique combat system and a game world that sets no limits to the game experience.

name: Vector Light
description: A 2D abstract puzzle game where the goal is to find the right pattern to maximize your scores!

name: Iceroyds!
description: Iceroyds! is the ultimate family-friendly local multiplayer arcade competition game, for all ages.

name: Elf Manor
description: You will be playing as an Elf Master. Build your own manor and grow crops, farm, research, cook, and handcraft by yourself. Your mission is to fight against evil monsters and protect the world from corruption. The most important thing is staying alive.

name: Dinodrifters
description: Discover the the ancient past with DINODRIFTERS! Explore prehistory as one of the Dinodrifters; a team of time-travelling rangers. Encounter and play as a great myriad of creatures great and small, including Tyrannosaurus, Liopleurodon and Gigantoraptor from every time period all over the globe!

name: DreamBall
description: Welcome to DreamBall, the first sports video game with ragdoll physics, set in dreams with which you will enjoy of the craziest matches ever. Play up in the space, under de sea, in a pirate island… Let your imagination fly or let be carried by ours.

name: Musicus!
description: Musicus! is a story-rich visual novel that tells a story of the struggle to fit society's mold while living for ourselves.

name: Troll Control
description: Troll Control is an Action-Adventure RPG with procedurally generated environments set in the bizarre high-fantasy world of Anachronia. It is a top-down dungeon crawling experience to play solo or up to 4 players in true couch co-op style!

name: It's Raining Fists and Metal
description: Pick up your guitar, and get ready to play and fight on this festival, because It's Raining Fists and Metal!

name: Capsule Servant
description:
An expanded version of a mini-game originally included in the PlayStation Vita release of Fate/hollow ataraxia. 
Planned as a premium mobile game with no in-app purchases, more information to be released later. 
 
It was announced as part of the Fate/stay night 15th anniversary project and is aiming for a release by the end of the year in Japan.

name: FPSBois
description: Hey, it's ya bois: FPS Bois! That online military shooter feel without the big corporate pricetag!

name: Moor
description: A long forgotten kingdom located in the mountain of Moor was sealed off a long time ago, but noone really knows why. Join a small group of explorers in the quest to discover what really happend beyond the moutain walls.

name: Day Zero - Build, Craft, Survive
description: Underneath your screen sits an extraordinary network, vast and unexplored. But, there is something dark lurking within the depths of the network. Welcome to the Oculus, a simulated world designed to act as a means of removing The Threat. Will you survive?

name: Ultracore: Collector's Edition
description: A physical Collector's Edition sold in limited quantity by Strictly Limited Games.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Last Survivor
description: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Last Survivor is a 20 player battle royale game set in Morioh Town, released for arcades in Japan.

name: BearHammer
description: Explore the beautiful island of Bearonia and defend Bears, Turtles, and Rabbits from the minions of the evil Toad King. Wield the powerful BearHammer and send enemies flying with ragdoll physics. Feel powerful. Explore the world. Prepare Your Bear.

name: Outpost
description: Outpost brings the perfect mix between survival and roguelike gameplay. Start the game in a randomly generated environment and try to make it through as many nights as possible. How long can you survive?

name: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX - Extra Song: "Raison d'être"
description:
Lola's got a new song & outfit!

Rack up over 1000 Kudos to hear Lola's new single "Raison d'être" and see her new Idol Mode outfit by using the "Outfit Changer" ability.
The song has also been added to the jukebox.

name: Black Smith
description: ■Work every day and if you save enough money, you can go and meet your girl.■BlackSmith lower his hammer. Click at the exact moment that the hammer lands. The better your timing is, the more experience points you'll get.■The higher your experience points, the more expensive you can sell your products.

name: Hoop League Tactics
description: Hoop League Tactics is a fresh new take on the sports management simulation genre. Take control of your basketball team and lead them to victory in turn-based tactical action. Manage your players between games by upgrading their skills and scouting for the next prospect to join your squad. Whether you'd rather control every action or watch from the sidelines, how you decide to play the game is entirely up to you!

name: Dying Light: Retrowave Bundle
description: Surf the retrowave with this bold retrofuturistic gear. This bundle includes a new outfit (Night Rider), a new buggy paint job (Speedmaster Turbo), and three new weapon blueprints (Blademaxx machete, Vindicator 2000 revolver, and Volkatronix rifle that shoots electric bullets).

name: Connor
description: See what's at the end of everything. Drive a road haunted by a voice who knows you all too well. Question the games medium as a whole. Peek into a depressed mind. Connor is what you make of it.

name: Hell Darkness
description:
Classic action RPG.
Monsters! Monsters! Monsters!
Destroy monsters, collect gold, upgrade your hero and fight the Supreme Dungeon Demon!

name: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX - Extra Mission: "VS ???"
description: It's time for an eXtreme challenge! A new mission has been added that pits you against an incredibly powerful Blade. You may even get a small reward if you're victorious...

name: Team Sonic Racing & Super Monkey Ball: Banana Blitz HD
description: Experience two of the best games from SEGA - Non-stop fast-paced fun for all ages and all types. Super Monkey Ball: Banana Blitz HD - Experience the magic of one of the most beloved titles in the series, now remastered in HD!

name: Light Ignite
description: Light defines beauty: relax and immerse yourself with this gorgeous, hypnotizing phenomenon in a stunning optical physics light game. Experience the unique physics of light rays in an amazing laser puzzle which is as challenging as it is joyful. Play with laser physics and control the beam's reflection, refraction, dispersion and curvature. Discover and become a virtuoso of dozens of exciting tools including lasers in all colors, lenses, mirrors and prisms - and even portals and black holes. And all of this with astonishing, real-time physics and visuals which will blow you away. Bring the light of creativity back into your life and build your own light games and levels - and enjoy countless puzzles by your friends, and the Light Ignite players community.

name: X-Plane 11: JustAsia - VCBI: Sri Lanka Intl Airport
description: Bandaranaike International Airport is the main international airport serving Sri Lanka. It has one runway that serves for commercial but also military use. Both are accurately model in this scenery.

name: X-Plane 11: JustAsia - OBBI: Bahrain Intl Airport & City
description: X-Plane 11: JustAsia - OBBI: Bahrain Intl Airport & City is a major Middle Eastern destination DLC for X-Plane 11.

name: X-Plane 11: JustAsia - WBKK: Kota Kinabalu Airport
description: Kota Kinabalu Airport is Malaysia's second busiest airport. Being a medium size airport connecting many major hubs to East Malaysia and it is a hub for Malaysia Airlines, AirAsia and several airlines.

name: X-Plane 11: JustAsia - LIEE: Cagliari Elmas Airport
description: Cagliari Elmas Airport (LIEE) is located on the located in the territory of Elmas, near Cagliari, on the Italian island of Sardinia.

name: Treasure Rangers
description: Sin descripción

name: Vader Immortal: Lightsaber Dojo - A Star Wars VR Experience
description: An extension of the award-winning Vader Immortal: A Star Wars VR Series, the Lightsaber Dojo experience allows players to train with a lightsaber and the Force against waves of training droids and Star Wars creatures.

name: Koi Suru Otome to Shugo no Tate: Bara no Seibo
description:
Because of his success in the events at St. Theresia Academy, Kisaragi Shuuji (Shield 9) has obtained a firm position within Aegis. That is, as the one in charge of “Crossdress infiltration”. Since the previous events, he has successfully completed several more assignments, and currently considers stepping down from the position. Unfortunately for him, however, he has been tasked with just 1 more assignment. This time, his task involves another all-girls school similar to St. Theresia Academy. He has to run in the elections for student council president and success in obtaining the position.

Shuuji himself considers the operation to be impossible. To infiltrate the school alone, and run in the elections that take place within just 2 months from now? There’s no way that he can do it. Especially since apparently there are many dangers involved with the run for student council president. And who knows what other traps lurk within the shadows of the Academy? Will he manage to find his way through?

name: Snolf: The Sonic Golf Experience
description:
Have you ever wanted to play through Sonic 2 without being able to run and jump? Do you want to watch helplessly as our hedgehog friend rolls backwards down the same slope for the fifth time in a row? Do you want to experience the fear and frustration of Chemical Plant Zone Act 2's rising water section as though you were playing it for the very first time? Well, my friend, look no further than SNOLF: The Sonic Golf Experience!

This romhack replaces Sonic's ability to move with a golf-game mechanic, similar to the kind of thing found in games like Kirby's Dream Course. Sonic remains rolled up into a ball under most conditions, and can only be launched when he has come to a stop. The Rings counter instead counts how many shots you have taken, allowing players to compete to get the lowest score!

name: D.C.4: Da Capo 4
description:
Those who live on the island of Kagamijima are used to the sight of the ‘large cherry blossom that floats in the sky’ rising out of the middle of the Mikagami lake. Such beautiful scenery had been the lone draw for the island, but lately a new sightseeing spot was born with the opening of a theme park based on Wonderland. The main character and humanoid AI Alice charms everyone with her lovely smile, while artificial faeries dance around the island like fireflies.

Ichito, a young man with an incomplete fairy tale-like skill.

Nino, his mischievous younger sister who won’t show her true side to anyone else.

Sorane, his neighbor that loves the siblings a lot and helps them out all the time.

Hiyori, his trouble-making classmate who has a surprisingly good record in helping people fall in love.

Shiina, a taciturn transfer student with a sharp tongue.

Suginami, his buddy who’s always aware of the latest mysteries.

Then there was Arisu, an ojousama with the same name as the protagonist from Wonderland.

As the sakura petals flutter and artificial faeries dance, a tender love story begins on the island closest to the sky.

name: Bustafellows: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition is a Japan-only release that includes:

- Game: Bustafellows
- Soundtrack CD
- Drama CD
- Setting Materials Collection
- Illustration Portrait
- Postcard
- Special Outer Box

name: Guide of the Butterfly
description: A small experience in guiding a butterfly to the end...

name: Ling Xia Ji Yi
description: Sin descripción

name: Encore Card Games
description: A great card game collection, with all the games you know and love. Card Games Collection features over 70 games and so much more!

name: Punchline!!
description: Punchline!! is a slice-of-life comedy visual novel. Enter the not-so-sane daily life of an eccentric, good-for-nothing bum with an unhealthy interest in peculiar conspiracies and a snarky, cynical part-time drunk as they navigate the weird and wacky city of Noo Yawk.

name: Santa's Workshop: Unhinged
description: Help! Santa's Toy Machine Broke! Quick, find places to get rid of all the presents before it's too late and the room fills up with too many of them!!!

name: The Blackbird of Amor
description: When there is an unsolved mystery, Stein can't let it go, he must pursue it till the end. In Amor there is a certain woman that interests him, she is rumored to have eternal youth. To solve the mystery of this woman he must tear heaven from earth. His journey will take him far beyond the world he has known.

name: Blank
description: Dive in the metaphorical universe of Blank, a third-person puzzle-platformer game with strong stealth aspects. In a world filled with headless people, you must escape from the claws of the Metropolis, switch perspective to find the right path through this dystopian world and recover Blank’s true identity.

name: Rose Riddle 2: Werewolf Shadow
description: A menacing presence has claimed its first victim on the streets of the Fairy Kingdom! More will follow unless you solve the mystery of the Werewolf Shadow!

name: The Magician's Workshop
description: When your master is murdered, you must uncover the magical secrets of Renaissance Italy, before your rival apprentices expose them first!

name: The Disguiser of Fate
description:
This is a world at the brink of destruction, but he comes from a destroyed world. Bearing the burden of changing the fate of this world and facing everything before him, especially the eminent destruction, what can he do, and what price will he pay?

Windward_Birds' new game, The Disguiser Of Fate. Is a traditional fantasy RPG game.

name: Space Digger
description: They only wanted to do their job, but the pigs decided otherwise. Take command of a small spaceship having to dig through waves of asteroids in order to earn your worth. Watch out for the pink menace!

name: Chained: A Victorian Nightmare
description: Chained: A Victorian Nightmare is a haunting VR adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic tale, A Christmas Carol. Prepare to be transported into a bone-chilling journey of self-discovery.

name: Bomber Fox
description: Bomber Fox is an action, sci-fi-themed game of the new generation, with an emphasis put into the dynamic gameplay, diverse level design, and innovative game modes.Play as Fox - the space cyborg, who has to win the grand robot-fighting tournament, to be granted a chance to go back home!

name: DEM_Stage_Zero
description: Stage 0 is a puzzle-based VR room escape adventure game.

name: Fast Food Never More
description: Ollie doesn't play sports and has bad eating habits, after visiting the doctor, Ollie found he was not in good health. Your goal is to help Ollie lose 10kg collecting all the natural and healthy foods and destroying the fast foods that come on Ollie's way. This journey will not be easy, but you will make it!

name: Concept 20
description: Concept 20 is a mix of gameplays with just one objective, get the ball or block into the yellow box.

name: Oh Jeez, Oh No, My Rabbits Are Gone!
description: A scary noise in the night has spooked your poor rabbits, and now all 100 of them have scattered across the valley! Run, climb, jump, and call out commands to your darling bunnies to bring them home to safety in this short n' sweet puzzle platformer — but make sure to be home before dark.

name: Stickman League
description: 《火柴人联盟2》为《火柴人联盟》的正统续作，同为横版动作游戏，但又和一代作品截然不同：

name: Gachi Heroes 2: Flexboll
description: Everyone knows who the real king of Flex and today he is ready to teach you. Plunge into an incredible adventure, meet different characters from the universe "gachimuchi" and find out how deep you are ready to go. However, there is one problem...

name: Dual Brain Vol.1: Calculation
description: ■ Rules are simple. Solve the problem within the time limit and aim for a high score. The high score in the game is registered in the online ranking. Compete for scores with players around the world. ■This time calculation. There are many calculation games in this game. Anyone can play happily, even those who are not good at calculations and those who are good at calculation. ■ Let's train parallel processing ability with "DUAL TASK". Not just a brain training game! Handle "DUAL TASK" while solving the problem. If "Dual Task" is successful, the remaining time limit will increase. The remaining time limit will be added to the score as “TIME BONUS”. Solve the problem and complete “DUAL TASK” to become the best player in the world.

name: PuPaiPo Space Deluxe
description: Hop into your spaceship and battle waves of opponents in your journey to find the legendary space pizza! Now 100% more Deluxe than ever!

name: Craft Elements
description: Craft Elements is a first person minecraft-esque journey into the nuclear reactor design, periodic table and vaporwave world. It is a unique, simple and atmospheric sandbox puzzle game with a focus on complex simulation and calculations.

name: Borderlands 3: Moxxi's Heist of the Handsome Jackpot
description: Ready for the biggest score of your career? Moxxi has just the job for you, sugar: a good old-fashioned heist. Battle your way through Hyperion forces, crazed casino-goers, and claim your loot!

name: Bokuten: Why I Became an Angel
description:
One day while practicing archery, Tomoe shoots an angel out of the sky.
While he doesn't believe in love, the angel Aine literally sings its praises.
Like it or not, Tomoe will have to help Aine play cupid to bring together all of the distressed couples they encounter.

name: Mega Man & Mega Man X 5in1 Special Box
description:
A box set decorated with Mega Man 30th Anniversary art containing 19 Mega Man games and the voice acting script used for Mega Man 11.
Only announced for Japan.

Contains:
- Mega Man Legacy Collection
- Mega Man Legacy Collection 2
- Mega Man X Legacy Collection
- Mega Man X Legacy Collection 2
- Mega Man 11
- Mega Man 30th Anniversary acrylic stand
- The 136 page Mega Man 11 script, in a reduced size

Also has a space for the Mega Man Zero/ZX Legacy Collection, releasing a month after this box set.

name: The Rainbow World
description: Explore a vibrant world in this action adventure RPG where you get embroiled in a war between the 7 major races of the rainbow world.

name: Beyond Critical
description: Beyond Critical is a sci-fi versus game where players use unique abilities to battle for control over a super massive black hole.

name: Warriors Orochi 4 Ultimate
description: An updated/enhanced version of Warriors Orochi 4 that will be available as a standalone game or as an upgrade pack for the base game.

name: Terminal squad: Sentinel
description: The age of an active space conquest by Humanity. You are a simple scout who had been sent out to explore a new planet. You must collect information about it and transfer it to the Center. But is it all that simple or is there anything you still don't know?

name: Marvel Super War
description: Marvel Super War is a free-to-play 3D, third-person multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) game by NetEase and Marvel Entertainment. It is in beta both on Android and iOS and is available to download only in selected countries

name: Sandbox Anything
description: A creative building-like game, where the objective is to throw physics enabled objects to create structures to allow the objective of the level to be completed. Can be a very challenging puzzler or an easy, sit back and relax game.

name: Re:Ozma
description: Re:Ozma is a 2D Action-Adventure sandbox game. RE:OZMA features exploration, multiplayer, community, digging, infinite creativity, crafting, building, combat with a variety of creatures in a procedurally generated 2D world.

name: Gerty
description: Gerty is a top-down rogue-lite twin-stick shooter with a fully destructible environment. Carve your own path through replayable procedurally generated levels and create tactically advantageous situations to eliminate the alien threat in intense, tough but fair, action-packed gameplay. Mine Juice crystals to upgrade your gear, discover alien structures, and eliminate the source of the alien threat in singleplayer or local co-op mode.

name: Homestar VR
description: Sin descripción

name: TO4: Tactical Operations
description: TO4: Tactical Operations brings back those nostalgic feelings you know from the early days of online shooters. We love that sheer easy-to-learn-hard-to-master attitude. The fun of playing with friends in a game where you need tactics, ammo clips, bravery and perhaps a bit of luck.

name: Star Revenge 6.25: Luigi's Adventure DX
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcadia: Arcade Watch Games
description: Arcadia is a collection of 22 arcade games for Apple Watch, iPhone, iPad and Apple TV.

name: Cadence of Hyrule: Crypt of the NecroDancer Featuring the Legend of Zelda - Octavo's Ode
description: Octavo's Ode is a free update for Cadence of Hyrule that introduces a new mode, also called Octavo's Ode, wherein Octavo is added as a playable character. Additionally, Dungeon Mode allows players to play through single dungeons without an overworld in a similar fashion to the classic Crypt of the NecroDancer.

name: Zaccaria Pinball: Zombie Invasion
description: Sin descripción

name: Quake: Xmas Jam 2019
description: Annual Christmas mapping event. This pack features 17 small maps in varied styles where all gameplay takes place within a 1024x1024x1024 space. It includes a start map and is powered by the Arcane Dimensions devkit (included) + and some additional content. The map sources are included as well.

name: Fallen London: The Brass Grail
description:
An addon for Fallen London. A Premium Story from December, 2019. Originally a seasonal event for Sackmas.

Available from the Explore the Festive Season action during the yearly Sackmas event. Available year round from the Fate page.

name: TV Night
description: Just a kid watching TV at night... FIND THE TAPES

name: Last Legacy
description:
LAST LEGACY is a free-to-play fantasy-romance visual novel with optional paid content from FICTIF GAMES, created by a small team of queer people of color.

With branching dialogue and multiple endings for each character route, your choices alone will spell the fate of the world...

Whether you're dooming it or saving it.

name: MX vs. ATV All Out: Hometown MX Nationals
description: The most authentic outdoors track pack created to date. Featuring 4 huge Nationals tracks and 2 Freeride environments that you can explore with different time of day variations.

name: Zaccaria Pinball: Cine Star Deluxe Pinball Table
description: Cine Star Deluxe is the next Zaccaria table with a fully animated color display. It also features more modern pinball elements.

name: WitchSpring4
description:
The game is set on the Ürphea Continent, after the Witch Hunts of the previous three games have concluded. It follows up on a plot thread revealed in Witch Spring 3's post-game.

The new protagonist is Moccamori, the current queen of Ürphea. Having suppressed the Spring War on the continent and becoming queen, she now seeks to conquer the remaining two continents.

name: Song of Bloom
description:
Song of Bloom
is an intense tale about everything,
packed into a short, handcrafted experience.

Playfully explore a story,
told in rapidly changing art styles,
find out how to control it,
and uncover what happened.

name: Space Duet
description: Two pet pilots enter, one succeeds! Duel in spaceships using rockets to try and knock out the opponent.

name: Duel Masters Play's
description: Japanese online card game based on the popular "Duel Masters", developed by DeNA in collaboration with Wizards of the Coast.

name: Winter Snow
description: Winter snow is a game about love on campus. Heterosexual students with different personalities are secretly in love with the flourishing male host. In choosing to communicate with a certain person, the male host is only left, love her or give her love. Winter snow, different people, different choices, different stories, different suns!

name: Go For a Walk
description: Go For a Walk through a world made of music with your canine companion!

name: Star Jolt
description: Star Jolt is a pure highscore chasing 80s arcade style game where control at break neck speed is essential.

name: Dead Territory
description: After the nuclear disaster, all living things took on a new form. Your mission: to clear the territory of the undead.

name: War Robots: Planet Defender
description: In the distant future, the human beings begin their interstellar travel in the vast universe, and lots of rich planets were mined. But not every planet is peaceful, cruel pirates, wandering rebels, runaway robots, monsters.... We have to face these challenges.

name: Cold Wires
description: Cold wires-is a 2D arcade game with a side view, the essence of which is to clean the playing field and charge with the battery.

name: The North Pole
description: Put on your Santa suit this Christmas and get ready to play at The North Pole!

name: Microscope Madness
description: A strange virus has attacked the cell cultures in your laboratory, and it's up to you to manipulate the extra large "mother" cells and use them to destroy the attacking mutant motiles!

name: Super Space Shooter Arena
description: Control a spaceship in this local-multiplayer game and eliminate the other player(s) from the arena. Will you be crowned champion or will you be eliminated. Choose free-for-all or team-battle. Will you charge your attack for more damage or will you shoot a burst of smaller projectiles.

name: Defending Frontiers
description: Defending Frontiers is a city defense, 2D graphics with a side view, a memorable and atmospheric soundtrack, colorful and beautiful graphics and unforgettable experiences.

name: Spelling Quest Online
description: Spelling Quest Online is a real-time multiplayer competitive word game: flex on friends and strangers with your vocabulary and typing ability.

name: OK Boomer
description: Travel back in time to the year of 2019 and infiltrate boomers campsite located in Riverside, California.

name: Mineirinho Director's Cut
description: A really cool 3d platform game, lots of extreme adventures with our friend Miner, now we have the option Double Miner and the adventure gets a lot cooler. Director's Cut version has unpublished scenes that have never been seen.

name: Fight of Animals
description: Animal memes such as Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel and more are now become Fighters!! Simple Controls & Funny Animals & Exciting Battles!!! Choose your favorite animal and join the fight!! Players are able to fight through arcade mode become the King of Animals!

name: Your little story: Winter
description: You were preparing for the New Year celebration, decorating the Christmas tree. But with your bad luck, you've slipped and fallen unconscious... When you came back to yourself, you found an incredibly beautiful person next to yourself.

name: EverQuest: Torment of Velious
description: Torment of Velious is the twenty-sixth expansion to EverQuest. It brings you a level increase from 110 to 115 with new spells and AAs, gear, and content with 6 new zones, and quests, raids and more.

name: Tip of the Spear: Task Force Elite
description: Tip of the Spear: Task Force Elite is a multiplayer FPS with old school roots. Engage in infantry combat across urban and terrain-based maps in classic game modes, like Team King of the Hill, and master a realistic ballistics system to snipe the enemy from a mile away.

name: Zombie Season
description: Zombie Season is an action packed FPS made for VR. Become the local rookie in Pine City, select your weapons, and do your best to exterminate the zombies before they overcome the city.

name: Lulu & Ennoi: Sacred Suit Girls
description: After a fated encounter with two girls, the newly chosen hero embarks on an adventure. Faced with the succubus race's imminent destruction, will he stand by his chivalrous path of a hero or pave way for an uncertain peace between the races?

name: Blink
description: Blink is a camera simulation game with basic camera functions, and you can take epic photos at home

name: Basketball Classics
description:
5 on 5 Pro Basketball born from the golden era of sports games. This spiritual successor to the 8-bit ballers bridges the gap between retro and today’s simulation games. 
 
Side-scrolling, sweaty arcade action with simplified 3-button gameplay and retro vibes galore. Explore decades of rosters featuring 160+ teams and 800+ players – all with individualized attributes. Introducing the first seamless play calling system of its kind, along with sensational cut scenes. Single player Story Mode unlocks secret teams or engage in endless scream-inducing local multiplayer. 
 
Lace up those hi-tops, hot shot. It's time to show us what you got.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted - Bundle
description:
Five Nights at Freddy’s VR: Help Wanted is a collection of classic and original mini-games set in the five nights universe. Survive terrifying encounters with your favorite killer animatronics in a collection of new and classic FIVE NIGHTS AT FREDDY’S experiences.

The Curse of Dreadbear DLC unlocks a new Halloween themed hub packed with spooky new mini-games and prizes.

name: Final Fight LNS Ultimate
description:
Final Fight LNS is a beat'em up that mixes concepts and movements from both this genre and the fighting genre. It has a revolutionary and new combo system based on "cancelling", which allows us to link special movements within others, thus being able to perform a very high number of hits. The game is also designed so that its difficulty decreases considerably as we learn and run this system, so the learning curve is steep. In other words, the game will reward us as we learn to deal maximum damage to enemies.

The roster of playable characters consists of 120 (114 + 4 hidden + 2 super hidden) characters, combining fighters from several of Capcom's most successful sagas such as: Final Fight, Street Fighter II, Street Fighter III, Street Fighter IV, Street Fighter Alpha, Cadillacs and Dinosaurs, Captain Commando, Alien vs Predator, Battle Circuit, Punisher, Knights of the Round, Warriors of Fate, Marvel vs Capcom and Capcom vs SNK. Despite the wide repertoire, each character is balanced and arranged so that the playable experience is optimal, we choose the character we choose and we have chances to finish the game without continuing with any of the 120 characters and in any of the game modes.

name: Planet Zoo: Arctic Pack
description: Join Bernie Goodwin on an epic Arctic adventure and explore new challenges, animals, and more! Alongside two new Scenarios in which you face new challenges as a zoo manager, there are four new animals and over 200 scenery pieces to make your parks as cool as ice.

name: Wreckfest: Modified Monsters Car Pack
description: This pack contains five vehicles.

name: Crash + Spyro Triple Play Bundle
description:
Get seven full games in one amazing package with the Crash + Spyro Triple Play Bundle.

Includes:

- Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy
- Spyro Reignited Trilogy
- Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled*

name: Ookami Game Another
description: An alternate telling of the original Wolf Game story. This version introduces three new participants on top of all of the original participants and different murderers/story.

name: 3M Spain Foundation: Stem + VR
description:
An educational project of 'Scientific dissemination' to encourage STEM vocation in children.

Includes 4 individual experiences of virtual reality (Science, math, technology and engineering block) to be lived in groups of 3 players (Required)

During each one, children visit different age and scenarios, where they learn specific content to the subject matter (STEM) and meet challenges in a collaborative way.

name: Sleepless Nights at Freddy's
description: Sin descripción

name: Gratia
description: A narritive RPG about gratitude!

name: Johnny Trigger
description: Johnny Trigger is a 3rd person shooter with a side view in which out take out criminals.

name: Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout - "The End of an Adventure and Beyond"
description: A new story is added in which Lila is the main character. During the story, although Empel also appears in the story, the player controls Lila as they play the game.

name: Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout - "Ever Summer Queen & the Secret Island"
description: A story set on a private beach is added.

name: Jump Force: Character Pack 8 - Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez
description: Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez from Bleach joins the fray! This pack includes the playable character Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez along with corresponding avatar outfit parts and his moveset.

name: Jump Force: Character Pack 9 - Trafalgar Law
description: Trafalgar Law from One Piece joins the fray! This pack includes the playable character Trafalgar Law along with corresponding avatar outfit parts and his moveset.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft Airport Vitoria-Foronda XP
description: The airport of Vitoria is a Spanish airport managed by Aena, built in 1980. It’s located 8 kilometers from the city center next to the village Antezana de Foronda, this is the reason why it’s known as Foronda Airport.

name: Singularity: Tactics Arena
description: Singularity: Tactics Arena is a narrative-driven RPG set in the universe of A Memory of Eternity. Taking place immediately after the events of the The Singularity Wish, the player assumes control of Eloise Fleming, a talented and capable young programmer at the Synder Corporation. Waking up in an unfamiliar cell with three other captives, Eloise and her new companions will have to fight their way out through the Arena.

name: Overcooked! 2: Winter Wonderland
description:
Winter Wonderland is a celebration of the 2019 DLC for Overcooked! 2 and includes brand new seasonally dressed kitchens inspired by Campfire Cook Off, Night of the Hangry Horde and Carnival of Chaos!

This update includes:
- New festive levels: Five new festive kitchens that give a taste of the 2019 DLC packs (one from Campfire Cook Off, two from Night of the Hangry Horde and two from the recently released Carnival of Chaos)
- Two new chefs: Rock around the Christmas kitchen as Reindeer Chef or Present Head Chef!
- Horde Mode: Now includes new festive enemies! (Who knew candy canes could be so terrifying?!)
- Five seasonal recipes: Hot chocolate, pancakes, roast dinners, Christmas puddings and mince pies!

name: Red Desert Render
description: Discover the secrets hidden in a vast desert, take a hot bath, and maybe grow a pumpkin.

name: Radial-G: Proteus
description: Radial-G: Proteus is a futuristic arcade racer for the VR generation! Climb into the cockpit of a gravity-defying race craft and tear up the tubular tracks as battle commences. Radial-G delivers full immersion racing featuring gut-wrenching twists, jumps, splits and unique inverted racing.

name: ArtPulse
description: Spawn and combine shapes, colors and freehand painting to sync them seamlessly into the background music. Let your creativity flow free!

name: British Gangsters
description: Dive into the timeless England of the 60's and set off in pursuit of the dreaded Doctor Wong! Shooting, intrigue, fantasy in a breathtaking comics world!

name: Batman: The Telltale Series - Shadows Mode
description: The Batman Shadows: The Enemy Within mode brings a captivating new look to the storied Telltale Batman games. Enhanced with hand recolored gameplay and remastered textures, replay your favorite Telltale Batman episodes and experience the twisted world of the Dark Knight in a sinister, new way.

name: Telltale Batman Shadows Edition
description:
Step into the shadows and experience the twisted world of Telltale's Batman in a way that brings the fractured persona of the Dark Knight and the City of Gotham to life in a sinister, new way. Enhanced with hand recolored game play and remastered textures, the Telltale Batman Shadows Edition brings all ten Telltale Batman episodes across two seasons into one, complete game while staying true to the spirit of the Dark Knight's rich, visually compelling history.

Includes:
• Batman: The Telltale Series (Episodes 1-5)
• Batman: The Enemy Within (Episodes 1-5)
• Batman Shadows Mode

name: Give up the Dupe
description: Give Up The Dupe is a short 10-15 minute sokoban-style puzzle game where you cannot see or being seen by yourself.

name: Endless Ski
description: Relive the Classic 90's era game Ski Free in an re-imagined fun, fast paced skiing game. Don't forget to avoid the Yeti!

name: Escape the Ninja Room
description: You are trapped in Ninja Room. Can you escape from this room? This game is a point click type escape game.

name: Ren Qi Dong Man Da Luan Dou
description: 这是一款动漫呆萌与战斗激情完美交融的卡牌手游。

name: Terminal VR
description: Experience Earth's final descent into Armageddon in Virtual Reality as extreme weather violently spreads destruction, death, and a twisted virus across most of the planet.

name: Periodic Deliveries
description: As the director of your own space shipping company, design and optimize a galactic trade network to efficiently move goods to where they're needed. Start from nothing and expand your profits and technology until your influence reaches across the galaxy.

name: Sin Chess
description: Players play chess with original sin devil. The perfect combination of strategy card and Monopoly board game. Use heroes of different talents to challenge the seven sin.

name: The Big SokoBang
description: Explosion of new game features and elements enhancing the classic.SokoBang ("The Big SokoBang") is a brain trainer game for people who enjoy intellectual challenges.Each level is an exciting puzzle.

name: Hand Simulator: Survival
description: Wild island. Thirst and hunger. Dangerous animals and insects. The perfect place to test your survival skills, especially if you only have empty hands, especially if it is a hand simulator.

name: Bloody trains
description: Sitcom train attendant blowing heads simulator

name: Mini Motor Racing X
description: Grab your controller or strap on your VR headset and dive into the high-octane frenzy that is Mini Motor Racing X.

name: Parity
description: Compete with up to 8 players in this local & online multiplayer game! Use skills to get the edge on the opposing team - parry their shots or bamboozle the enemy with a bold spin-shot! You can choose between different stages and game modes and hone your Parity skills in thrilling fast-paced matches.

name: QR Code Killer
description: Interrogate and investigate with a dialogue system built around real world detective techniques, experience the grit and character of New York City and delve deep into a mystery that harnesses the power of Augmented Reality.

name: Cyber City
description: There is only one entertainment in a Cyber City - killing zombies in the arena.

name: Word Maze by Powgi
description:
Like a wiggly word search! Find the words to solve the maze!

It's a new and unique word search variation, exclusive to POWGI!

name: Wattam
description: From the creator behind Noby Noby Boy and Katamari Damacy comes Wattam - Long ago, a huge explosion blasted the world of Wattam across the galaxy. Help the Mayor build stacks and chains with characters like Sushi, Flower, Cloud & Poop to create joyful, colorful explosions that will guide the diaspora of Wattam back home.

name: XenoRaptor
description: Take control of a cyberdragon and annihilate swarms of rocket propelled chainsaws either online or via LAN in this high speed, high skill 8 player co-op twinstick shooter.

name: Shadows of Time
description: Shadows of time is an action packed adventure with a big heart on an important theme. In the game, five young heroes must cooperate across parallell timelines by using spectacular skills aquired from coping with bullying and their fears. Your goal is to defeat a being living in the dimension of time who has taken hold of their rural community and it's inhabitants.

name: Slender Killer
description: Slender Killer was a hidden level in Slender: The Nine Pages. The author have decided to make it standalone so everybody can play it.

name: Easy Hentai
description: A puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces.

name: Snowkissed Romance
description: Fall in love in the cozy mountains of Northern Japan. Call, text, and make choices to snag the best ending!

name: Paper Mario: Master Quest
description:
Paper Mario: Master Quest is a mod made for "Paper Mario" on the N64. It was created by Emperor_Thamz, Rainchus, JaThePlayer, and Brotenko. It revamps old content and adds plenty of new as well.
Often considered "The Dark Souls of Paper Mario", the mod is incredibly difficult.

name: I Can't Believe the Most Popular Girl in School is a Lesbian, Just Like Me!
description: A lesbian? Just like me?

name: Jurassic World Evolution: Jurassic Park Edition
description: Place yourself at the heart of the Jurassic franchise and build your own Jurassic World. Bioengineer dinosaurs that think and face threats posed by espionage, breakouts and devastating tropical storms in an uncertain world where life always finds a way.

name: Jurassic World Evolution: Expansion Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead or Alive 6: Rachel
description: Download this to use Rachel in DEAD OR ALIVE 6 and DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters.

name: Grass Mud Horse
description: 'Grass Mud Horse' is a PS2 inspired first-person video game about what it's like to work as a cinematographer on a film set.

developers.name: Toby Do | Emi Schaufeld | Julia Wang

name: Impossiball: Gamers Challenge
description: Impossiball - Gamers Challenge is a tiny skill-based 3D platformer game that will truly challenge your skills! This game is against the player - in fact, it tries to get you to fail pretty hard! Even tough rolling around with a ball may seem all easy - the game is really not! Beat the game or poorly fail!

name: SnakEscape: Remastered
description: SnakEscape is a turn-based logic game turning the traditional Snake gameplay concept upside down! This time You will mantle the role of the food, running away from the snaky Snakes.

name: Slippery Sausage
description: Slippery Sausage is a frantic arcade game where a sentient sausage is out to stop inanimate objects inhabited by mischievous alien spirits! Master handling your sausage, and defeat a wide variety of enemies across 50 levels!

name: Hello Player
description: A little nice adventure spoiled by bloggers! Help me reach them and make them my friends by using various mechanics of movement! Also game absolutely doesn't have the fourth wall!

name: World of relish
description: Cute girls need your help in this inconspicuous and cozy village. So will you be able help them to solve their problems? A lot of mini games and puzzles are waiting for you, enjoy it!

name: Atrofil: The Key
description: Post-apocalyptic survival thriller

name: The Emerald Tablet
description: Enter the world of alchemy in the daily adventures of the money-hungry but good intentioned Misty, the arrogant adventure-seeking Gladys, and the explosive "expert" Winifred.

name: Living with a Scarecrow
description: Living with a Scarecrow is a visual novel about a young man, Norbert living with a scarecrow.

name: WarpZone vs. The Dimension
description: WarpZone vs. The Dimension is a co-op beat'em up derived from the very essence of the 90s. Relive this nostalgia with a modern view!

name: Too White Basketball
description: This is a small, but fun basketball game in which you have to go through all 30 levels and become the best white basketball player from Tolyatti.

name: The Deer
description: Professional Bigfoot hunters Anthony Grant and Chad Foster embark on the ultimate expedition to the northern Minnesotan wilderness in search of evidence supporting the existence of Bigfoot.

name: Potata: Fairy Flower
description: Adventure platformer about Potata's travel in fairy forest. Reveal all secrets and hidden treasures and don't forget to save the world.

name: Planetary Dustoff
description: Planetary Dustoff is a moddable roguelite shooter. Go on a death riddled journey to sprawling alien environments and fight your way through hordes of enemies and epic boss battles. Unearth the many secrets of THE SPACE FACTION and find a new home for humanity.

name: Banjo-Threeie
description: Sin descripción

name: Saga of the Shattered Swords
description: A person who "resurrected from the dead" has led to 20 years of grievances and entanglements. A wish of "resurrection", revealing the historical truth of the 15th century. Shenzhou and Schicksal, Taixuan and Tianqiong, Seven Disciples and Five Essences... All the mysteries from 500 years ago are solved here.

name: SCP: Site-19
description: SCP: Site-19 is a mobile multiplayer SCP Foundation based game. Every round map is randomly generated & roles are random. So you never expect who you play as or who you gonna bump into.

name: Shattered Lands: Towers of Perdition
description: Shattered Lands: Towers of Perdition is a multi-part RPG saga for the Arduboy.

name: Hero's Harem Guild
description: In Hero's Harem Guild you're a simple poor guy who becomes a community hero for accidentally surviving a powerful demon. You'll lead a Guild full of beautiful adventurers willing to work, train, and fight for you. Upgrade the Guild, repair the town, seek new members, build relationships with those that already are and complete quests in this RPG-themed world.

name: Assembloids
description: Sin descripción

name: Tasty Ramen
description: A colorful PS1 styled spoopy game about a haunted bowl of ramen!

name: DKDC: Donkey Kong Distortion Country
description: DKDC: Donkey Kong Distortion Country is a ROM hack/mod of Donkey Kong Country which adds whole new levels and bosses to the game.

name: Domvs
description: A gothic mystery game in which you rely on your environment to uncover the truth. Contains religious content, multiple endings, optional audio, and lots of Latin.

name: Anthropocene Timeshare
description: Disasters have never deterred time travelers.

name: Masks
description: You’re a courier for the resistance, trapped on a university campus under siege. The environment around you is coming apart, fast.

name: Ninja Run
description: Run jump slide and battle your way to a high score in Ninja Run by CooperAce Productions

name: Lust Epidemic
description:
A student of East State University named Brad finds himself stranded at rival college Saint Dame University during a hurricane that has unexpectedly changed course and struck the town.

While exploring the ancient and creepy campus grounds you'll uncover many mysteries and secrets... as well as some sexy fun time with some amazing MILFS!

name: Monstrüous
description: a short (about 30-45 min long) but epic animated puzzle game !

name: Liquid Space
description: Liquid Space lets you interact with ultra-realistic liquids in zero gravity on the international space station.

name: Mario Takes a Three
description: Mario Takes a Three was a level contest that was held during June of 2019. This is a compilation game that features levels that were submitted to the contest. Can you finish all 24 levels?

name: Daiku no Medium
description:
A ship by the name of 'Lilith' has been navigating through space for two years with a single goal – reaching Eden, the heart of the Universe. The ship's team, consisting of Captain Lazarus, First Mate Anna and Second Mate Joseph, is constantly fighting through hundreds and hundreds of enemy 'Phantom 4s' that has been chasing them throughout the whole trip.

But the final frontier stands before them: Eden is almost within hand's reach...

name: Royal Detective: The Last Charm
description: Can you rescue your daughter and save both realms in time?

name: Grime & Gaslight
description: Victorian Era Horror Game

name: Roguescape
description: A small, rogue-like dungeon crawler game, inspired by the level generation mechanics of Spelunky. With added platforming elements, an easy-to-use inventory system, and purchasable items, Roguescape offers many levels of gameplay for you to learn as you explore the procedurally-generated dungeon.

name: Santa's Christmas Solitaire 2
description: An old foe has returned to ruin Christmas this year, can you help Santa defeat him and recover the Christmas presents?

name: Dimension C38B
description:
Trapped in Dimension C38B, your only chance to get home is to pilot your escape pod across one hundred abandoned ice bridges. 
 
Steer a course through the lost cargo from the ancient mineral minors, one false move and you’ll take a long fall into the unchartered worlds far below. 
 
 
Features : 
• 100 bridges, each a unique journey, each a little harder than the last. 
• Easy to learn, two thumb control but a constantly challenging game of skill and memory. 
• Navigate your pod through a maze of discarded mineral crates, through ever-changing temperate cloudscapes, storm force winds, gentle snow, and radiant sun. 
• Build up your power and use it to leap to higher bridges. 
• Days turn to night fast in Dimension C38B so be quick or hit the long shadows of darkness. Then enjoy a whole new perspective as the glistening sun gently rises. 
• Let atmospheric audio keep you cool, calm and collected. 
• Pause the game and soak up the luminous graphic skies. 
• Stop the game and pick it up another time or another day from where you left it. 
• Get support or brag to your friends with Game Centre achievements and leaderboards. 
• Dimension C38B is a game of skill, dexterity, and courage set in a unique world of bold shapes and vivid colours. It’s a premium game with no ads or in-app purchases.

name: Barrage Musical: Basic Danmaku Tutorial
description: A tutorial for shmup beginners. Presented by Lightsaber Fairy.

name: Jack-O-Lantern Covers of Darkness
description: The Jack-O-Lanterns have emerged from the underworld and are taking over the world.

name: Takkyu Tournament Re:Serve
description: This fantasy kung fu ping-pong mashup pays homage to classic retro arcade games while incorporating fighting game trappings like blocking, parrying, unique fighters, and special moves.

name: Timmy's adventures : VerbMon
description: A cartoon adventure game. Capture "VerbMons" using irregular verbs. Catch them all!

name: Hunter's Soul
description:
This game is a 2D action RPG where hunters fight monsters. 
Defeat enemies with swords and magic and move forward. 
 
If you defeat enemies, your soul will accumulate. 
And you can strengthen your character in the first room. 
You can also learn new techniques by defeating the boss. 
You can confirm the technique and move the place(shortcut) on the menu screen.

name: Magicolors
description: You are a Wizard, who to perfect himself in the art of magic, begins a challenging journey. Using the power of your staff and the ability to solve puzzles, you will acquire the energy of rare crystals and unlock powerful spells. Are you ready to this journey?

name: Shera and the Three Treasures
description: After the rise of a new Demon Lord, it falls on the chosen hero from an ancient bloodline to stop them. However, due to a curse cast upon him, he must pass the task to his sister Shera. Now she must gather the Three Treasures, and defeat the Demon Lord.

name: Defeat the Beat
description: Fight the fever in user-created beatmaps against your favorite songs! Can you feel the flow to Defeat the Beat?

name: Daoker: A Banished Tiger
description: Sin descripción

name: Control: Expeditions
description: Expeditions are a challenging combat experience with a set time limit for completion aimed at those who have already completed Control.

name: Dumb Ways to Dash!
description: Dash through crazy and chaotic levels as you compete against others as your favourite Bean. Dumb Ways to Dash is a brand new crazy 3D race runner game from the world of Dumb Ways To Die.

name: Tactics & Strategy Master 3: Gemini Strategy
description: Sin descripción

name: Spot The Differences 2020
